body: Many times, a true vampire sends mortal and undead minions to scout out an area, with a spawn pretending to be full vampire. If the group prospers, the vampire might visit. If the group is destroyed, the vampire knows it should proceed with caution. A vampire might also use this sort of team to claim a newly risen spawn from its coffin or crypt.
name: False Family

sections.body:
CR CR 1/2

XP 200 each

descriptor Addle-minded brigand

hp 15 each
